item.title: Beats by Dre designer Robert Brunner’s advice for creatives trying to make themselves heard: ‘Go take the comedy class’
item.description: "Learn how to stand up in front of people to communicate thoughts and ideas”, Ammunition founder Robert Brunner said at Fortune Brainstorm Design.

item.title: Generative AI can’t shake its reliability problem. Some say ‘neurosymbolic AI’ is the answer
item.description: Neurosymbolic AI could be a best-of-both-worlds marriage between deep learning and "good old-fashioned AI."

item.title: This was Bashar al-Assad’s mansion. Syrians are now helping themselves to its opulence after the ousted dictator fled to Russia
item.description: Crowds could be seen snatching clothes, plates and whatever belongings they could find including a Louis Vuitton cardboard shopping bag.

item.title: Who is Al-Jolani, the Syrian rebel who ended Assad’s rule?
item.description: Al-Jolani joined al-Qaeda in Iraq after the US invasion and was detained and jailed by the Americans there.

item.title: Biden says US troops will remain in Syria to fight ISIS as Assad regime collapses
item.description: U.S. forces on Sunday conducted air strikes on Islamic State camps and operations in Syria, Biden said.
